name: Underwater Temple
description:
Underwater temple is a vertical platformer with a die and retry look You play Pepito, a frog in search of ancient treasures. After collecting treasures, you fall into a cave that looks like a place where an ancient people lived. However, you must quickly find a way back up because your fall has caused a landslide causing the waters to rise.  You may be a frog, but your pack is way too heavy to swim in. If you don't want to be stuck at the bottom of this cave for eternity, come back to the surface quickly!
  • Jump from platform to platform
  • Leap from walls
  • Avoid obstacles
  • Activate the mechanisms
  • Get to the surface as quickly as possible
2 difficulty mods : If you're a speedrunner and don't want checkpoints, the underwater temple mode is for you !

Game in FRENCH FOR NOW, english update soon. 

Update for english trad and fix bug soon.

Group end-of-year project completed in 2 months 

Lecocq Raphaël (Programming and vfx)

Chartier Christian (Assets, textures and hud)

Autissier Julien (Assets, textures,hud and pepito animation)

Bayet Margaux (Pepito Sculpt, assets and texture)

Blueprint programming in UE4
